Daniel Saakes is trained as an industrial design engineer at Delft University of Technology and he likes making things and making things that make things. Recent years he has been active at ID Studiolab, MIT Medialab, Keio University, Japan Science and Technology Agency, University of Tokyo and Umea institute of design.
Personal Home Page

Foong Yi Chia received her bachelor degree in aerospace engineering and started this year in the graduate school of Industrial Design. Currently she is researching the ecology of distributed fabrication.

We just started this winter. Join us.

about

In Meta Industrial Design we look at users as the designers of their own life.

We innovate in open design, physical design tools, custom design as service and local manufacturing using digital fabrication.

follow us

Follow @saakes

contact

MID lab is based at the department of Industrial Design at KAIST Korea. We are one hour from Seoul. How to get here.

Address: MIDlab, id KAIST, room 417~9, bldg N25, 291 daehak-ro yuseong-gu, Daejeon 305-701, Republic of Korea
Tel: +82 (0) 42 350 4525
Tel: +82 (0) 42 350 4502 (Korean)
Fax: +82 (0) 42 350 4510
